Title: Authorizes the alienation of certain parklands in the town of Amherst, county of Erie
Summary: Authorizes the alienation of certain parklands in the town of Amherst, county of Erie for lease to Bell Atlantic Mobile Systems, LLC d/b/a Verizon Wireless for the placement and operation of a wireless communications tower.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the alienation of certain parklands in the town of Amherst, county of Erie
